messages.message: Hey Daniel as a workaround most of the escaping in refiner is unecessary, it just the text color that is wrong. For example parenthesis. And then if you use double quote you can get arround

Yeah... I noticed lots of double escapage... I did end up removing a bunch.  Its unclear what would get "auto escaped" and what wouldnt.  I'd like to see our platform perform a bit more consistently on these so that its really clear how we should handle these situations and what an acceptable way to surface these errors might be.
